attributes.action: Apply congestion charges to middel lane drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that charging systems implemented motoring reasons in this country are to generate money rather than the safety or environment guises which you tell us there for.

This idea will generate alot of cash, reduce congestion and help protect the environment so we're both winners.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
